name: Champions of Norrath
synopsis: Discover what it takes to become a champion.  From the makers of EverQuest comes Champions of Norrath, an action RPG that allows you to create your own hero, journey across fantastic lands and play against others online.  Customize your champion's powers, appearance and abilities.  Battle vicious orcs and goblins using deadly spells or fierce weapons.  Play alone or with up to three players via Multitap or the Internet.  Do anything you can to prove you have the heart of a champion.
